    @pytest.mark.dependency(name="test_03", depends=["test_02"])
    def test_03_check_2nd_party_apps_in_appdrawer(driver, adb):
        """
        RTN結束後，APPS應該要回復並出現在App Drawer
        """
        try:
            ensure_driver_alive(driver)
        except InvalidSessionIdException:
            print("[Step03] driver session is dead after reboot, restarting session...")
            driver = restart_driver(driver)
    
        driver.implicitly_wait(1)
        time.sleep(3)
    
        # 執行翻頁掃描
        found_apps = check_apps_in_all_pages(driver, TARGET_APP_LABELS)
        print(f"[DEBUG] 在 AppDrawer 所有頁面中找到的 App: {found_apps}")
        missing_apps = [app for app in TARGET_APP_LABELS if app not in found_apps]
        if missing_apps:
